@Roy_Evo @Maryevo46 Both my hubster and I are Reds, so going out for a VDay dinner is postponed till tomorrow night. He got me flowers and a card. I made a quick dinner and bought VDay dessert. C'mon you Reds!!
@martin_compston Yes, make sure Steve and Kate are besties again! Someone has to pay for the Indian takeaway!
@SamHeughan Happy V Day Sam... Should've come in blue!
@jamieoliver Salmon en croute

@StephenWalters Just catching up on Shetland and how amazing you're back on our screens. Loved you on Hillsborough and missed you as Angus in Outlander. Can't wait to for next week's episode on @BBCOne
@djhenshall Finally caught up with Shetland on @BBCOne One of the best dramas on TV still. After bingeing on @Outlander_STARZ it's exactly what I need to stay "in Scotland mode"
RT @HamillHimself: It's said "You can never go home again." But be careful if you do... it's liable to grab you right in the feels. #ManyMâ€¦
@martin_compston Showers and wind have started here on the east coast... A bit like Scotland but with loads more Guinness! Enjoy!
@djhenshall @davykane Thank YOU all... Brilliant writing, acting, directing. Tuesday nights will never be the same again.

@StephenWalters @BBCOne Amazing as always! I mean, talk about an emotional rollercoaster throughout the series, but tonight, you and @djhenshall really made me cry, yell "no, no, nooo" at the TV, and wail when they couldn't save you! Thank YOU!
As always, one of the best dramas on TV... Take a bow @djhenshall and @StephenWalters and all the cast and writers of #Shetland
Oh god oh god nooooo #Shetland
Trying for Thomas now. Tosh... Sound and wise words.... #Shetland
Shetland isn't small enough to make that drive Jimmy! Driiiive!!! #Shetland
Just looked at the clock and remembered to take a breath... How can this be the last #Shetland this series? Breaaaathe!!!

@RYANMCS Tough semi final last night!! @GregorErin has danced her inspirational heart out, week in and week out. You should have been in the final, but credit to Brian, who voted for Erin for technique. Thanks for making our Sundays glittery and fab!! xx
That was not an easy decision. Voted for @RYANMCS and @GregorErin from week one. What a brilliant and inspirational person you are, Erin. And a gorgeous dancer! Will miss you both xx #DWTSIrl
